title: Business Licences
description: Details for a business within a city that holds a business licence with that city

BusinessID.description: An id number that uniquely identifies the business

UnitNo.description: The unit number of the building or apt where the business is located

HouseNo.description: The house number on the street of the building or apt where the business is located

Street.description: The street the business is located on

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the business

StreetAddress.description: The street, number, and unit number

MailingAddress.description: The mailing address of the licence holder

LicenceeName.description: The name of the licencee, the person who applied for the licence

BusinessType.description: The type of business it is eg. Food & Beverage, Personal Services

BusinessSubtype.description: The subtype of business it is eg. Restaurant/Cafe, Barber/Hair Salon

IssueDate.description: The date the licence was issued

ExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the licence

WebAddress.description: The url for the business website

Keywords.description: Keywords associated with a given business

TypeCode.description: A code denoting the business type

TypeDescription.description: A description of the type code along with the code itself, a brief description of the space

ShapeLength.description: The length of the business space

ShapeArea.description: The area of the business space
